description.narrative: p.cls-NormalWeb { margin-top:5pt; margin-bottom:5pt; text-align:justify; font-family:'Times New Roman', 'serif'; font-size:12pt; line-height:108%; margin-left:0pt; margin-right:0pt; } span.cls-DefaultParagraphFont { font-family:'Times New Roman', 'serif'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; margin:0in; padding:0in; } p.cls-NormalWeb-000000 { margin-top:5pt; margin-bottom:5pt; text-align:left; font-family:'Times New Roman', 'serif'; font-size:12pt; line-height:108%; margin-left:0pt; margin-right:0pt; } table { border-collapse:collapse !important; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; border-spacing:0 !important; margin-bottom:15px; } .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td, div table, div table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000;} .k-table td, table td, div table td { padding: 5px;} The project aims at supporting the growth of Union des Mutuelles Alliance de Credit et d'Epargne pour la Production (UM-ACEP) Senegal, a successful microfinance institution in Senegal, in expanding its lending operations in the agri-finance and MSME space. The proposed project consists of a local currency 4-year senior loan of up to XOF4 billion. 50% of the facility is expected to be on-lent to MSMEs in the agriculture sector. The project includes a possible mobilization of resources from the Global Agriculture and Food Security Program (GAFSP), a multilateral mechanism to support sustainable agriculture in developing countries.

participating-org.narrative: UNION DES MUTUELLES ALLIANCE DE CREDIT ET D'EPARGNE POUR LA PRODUCTION

mailing-address.narrative: UM-ACEP Senegal Mr Mayoro LOUM Managing Director +221 33 869 75 50 Avenue Bourguiba x Blvd Dial DIOP - BP 5817 - Dakar - Senegal

name.narrative: p.cls-NormalWeb { margin-top:5pt; margin-bottom:5pt; text-align:justify; font-family:'Times New Roman', 'serif'; font-size:12pt; line-height:108%; margin-left:0pt; margin-right:0pt; } span.cls-DefaultParagraphFont { font-family:'Times New Roman', 'serif'; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; margin:0in; padding:0in; } table { border-collapse:collapse !important; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; border-spacing:0 !important; margin-bottom:15px; } .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td, div table, div table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000;} .k-table td, table td, div table td { padding: 5px;} UM-ACEP is headquartered in Dakar, Senegal. It has a network of 16 branches and 89 sales points widely spread across Senegal.
